Posts.EditableText: Great idea, but could the text for "I need help with Quest or Squiffy" be edited to tell people to state if they are using the on-line editor or not?
Posts.HTML: Great idea, but could the text for "I need help with Quest or Squiffy" be edited to tell people to state if they are using the on-line editor or not?

Posts.EditableText:
That button is not new, it's been here for years.

If you write the text you'd like to see I can paste it in there.

Posts.EditableText:
Really? Okay... How about this:

> If you're still stuck, please try the forums – somebody may have already asked the same question, so it's a good idea to search first. Please make sure to post all the detail you can about your problem, including whether you are using the on-line editor or have downloaded Quest and are working off-line. If you can upload the file you're working on, or copy-and-paste any relevant code into your post (click the "Code view" button), that often helps a lot so we can see how you've set things up.
Posts.HTML:
Really? Okay... How about this:

If you're still stuck, please try the forums – somebody may have already asked the same question, so it's a good idea to search first. Please make sure to post all the detail you can about your problem, including whether you are using the on-line editor or have downloaded Quest and are working off-line. If you can upload the file you're working on, or copy-and-paste any relevant code into your post (click the "Code view" button), that often helps a lot so we can see how you've set things up.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks, I've updated that text now.
